input.issue: Analyze capabilities of Kubernetes resource: Node

output:
{
  "capabilities": [
    "worker node representation",
    "taints-based scheduling control",
    "unschedulable (cordon) flag",
    "resource capacity and allocatable reporting",
    "node conditions and phase reporting",
    "node addresses publication",
    "kubelet configuration via ConfigMap (NodeConfigSource)",
    "kubelet config status (active/assigned/lastKnownGood/error)",
    "pod CIDR assignment (podCIDR, podCIDRs)",
    "providerID association",
    "daemon endpoints (kubeletEndpoint)",
    "container images inventory",
    "node system information (kernelVersion, kubeletVersion, containerRuntimeVersion, osImage)",
    "volumes attached/in use tracking",
    "runtime handlers and features",
    "labels and annotations for selection and metadata"
  ],
  "providers": ["kubernetes"],
  "abstractions": [
    "scheduling constraints",
    "resource reporting",
    "health and status monitoring",
    "configuration management via ConfigMap",
    "networking CIDR management",
    "storage attachment tracking"
  ],
  "complexity": "high",
  "description": "Represents a Kubernetes worker node, exposing its configuration, scheduling controls, capacity, and detailed runtime/system status. Enables reporting and control of node health, networking, storage attachments, and kubelet configuration.",
  "useCase": "Manage and observe node state, capacity, and scheduling readiness within a Kubernetes cluster.",
  "confidence": 0.88
}
